sub_title: Empowering Enterprises with High-Performance AI Infrastructure Solutions for Scalable AI Innovation | EMEA Sales Manager DGX SuperPOD
summary:
Throughout my career, I have dedicated myself to working for organizations focused on data management, storage, and data protection. I thrive on helping customers overcome challenges arising from new data-driven initiatives that support their digital transformation. 

I have had the privilege of working with various startups, where I played a pivotal role in developing and building up the business in Benelux, Nordics, and Eastern Europe. My responsibilities encompassed direct sales, channel development, and strategic account deals, resulting in successful market expansion and revenue growth.

In my current role as EMEA Sales Manager for DGX Cloud and DGX SuperPOD, I am entrusted with delivering the fastest path to AI innovation at scale. Our turnkey AI supercomputing infrastructure solutions provide every enterprise with an effortless way to rapidly scale their AI initiatives, unlocking the full potential of their data.

Outside of work, I find joy in various physical activities such as fitness, padel, and tennis. These activities help me stay focused and reflect on my work effectively. I also cherish thought-provoking discussions with friends and business contacts, always remaining open to learning from them.

Feel free to connect on LinkedIn if I can be of any assistance.

profile_positions.description:
AI is transforming our planet and every facet of life as we know it, fueled by the next generation of leading-edge research. Organizations that want to lead in an AI-powered world know that the race is on to tackle the most complex AI models that demand unprecedented scale. Our biggest challenges can only be answered with groundbreaking research that requires supercomputing power on an unmatched scale. Organizations that are ready to lead need to attract the world's best AI talent to fuel innovation and the leadership-class supercomputing infrastructure that can get them there now, not months from now.

The NVIDIA DGX SuperPOD, based on the DGX A100 system, marks a major milestone in the evolution of supercomputing, offering a scalable solution that any enterprise can acquire and deploy to access massive computing power to propel business innovation. Enterprises can start small from a single SU of 20 nodes and grow to hundreds of nodes. The DGX SuperPOD simplifies the design, deployment, and operationalization of massive AI infrastructure with a validated reference architecture that is offered as a turnkey solution through NVIDIA’s value-- added resellers. Now, every enterprise can scale AI to address their most important challenges with a proven approach that is backed by 24x7 enterprise-grade support.
profile_positions.title: EMEA Sales Manager - DGX Cloud & DGX SuperPOD

profile_positions.description:
I'm responsible for the Ethernet Switch proposition in Denmark, Norway, and the Netherlands.
I joined NVIDIA with the acquisition of Cumulus Networks in 2020. 

Starting the new era of Open Networking 🐢🚀

Nvidia provides an evolved vision of networking from Cables and Optics, to open switches, choice of NOS and the network operations and management, bringing the entire network stack together, under a single vision.  Effectively bringing the flexibility and control of open standards-based technology with the freedom of choice and the level of support that best fits the needs of your business.

Under Nvidia, we can combine the benefits of Mellanox Spectrum based switches, proving the industries leading performing ASIC, with the latest network operating system advances including Cumulus Linux, Sonic, and Onyx.  In addition, Cumulus Linux is supported on over 130 open network switches from a variety of networking vendors.

Another critical aspect of open networking is the ability to leverage real-time telemetry data to gain actionable insight and operational intelligence into the health of your data center network.Cumulus® NetQ is a highly-scalable, modern network operations tool set that provides visibility, troubleshooting and lifecycle management into your overlay and underlay network in real-time.

NetQ leverages real-time telemetry data and correlates configuration and operational status to instantly identify and track state changes while simplifying management across a single fabric from data center to campus environments.
profile_positions.title: Sales Lead for the Netherlands and Northern Europe | Ethernet Switch Solutions

profile_positions.description:
Cumulus Networks was acquired by NVIDIA in 2020.
Within my role at Cumulus, I was responsible for the Netherlands, Poland, Czech Republic, the former Yugoslavian countries, Bulgaria, Hungary, Romania, and Greece.

Cumulus Networks is leading the transformation of bringing web-scale networking to the enterprise cloud. Our networking switching software, Cumulus Linux, is the only solution that allows you to affordably build and efficiently operate your network like the world’s largest data center operators – unlocking vertical network stacks.

Instead of focusing on siloed solutions, at Cumulus Networks, we transform every stage of the networking lifecycle — from architecture, design, build, deployment and operations — with our two core solutions, Cumulus Linux and Cumulus NetQ. Cumulus Linux is the most flexible network operating system available because it runs on Linux. Our customers access flexibility, efficiency, speed and choice with a unified stack and a feature set designed for the digital age. With Cumulus NetQ, we empower organizations with full network validation and reduced downtime and even extend network visibility into containers.

The network is a critical part of the data center that has traditionally been a bottleneck for rapid deployment of applications. From provisioning and deployment to monitoring and operations, we believe in completely transforming the industry by enabling a web-scale IT architectural approach.

We are not just defining the future of networking. We are actively creating it with our customers and partners.
profile_positions.title: Sales Lead for the Netherlands and Eastern Europe (Acquired by NVIDIA)

profile_positions.description:
One simple, scalable platform for disaster recovery, backup, and cloud mobility. 

Zerto allows you to replace multiple legacy tools with an easy to integrate and use IT Resilience Platform. It delivers an always-on customer experience and simplifies workload mobility while protecting and moving applications freely across a hybrid and multi-cloud environment. Zerto is trusted by more than 7,000 customers globally and is providing resiliency for Microsoft Azure, IBM Cloud, AWS, and more than 400 cloud service providers. 

Here’s why Zerto is trusted by over 6,000 customers globally:

•	Enterprise-class: Scalable to 10k VM’s, no agents, no snapshots, no production impact
•	Automation and Orchestration Simple, 3 clicks to failover, REST API, VPG for complex multi-VM applications
•	Cross-platform. Operations and visibility across technologies, hypervisors, versions, and clouds
•	Journal-based: Seconds of granularity up to 30 days, recovery in a few minutes
•	Fully Non-disruptive Testing. No production impact, enable testing often confidence, test before commit on failover, compliance reports
profile_positions.title: Enterprise Account Manager Benelux & Nordics

profile_positions.description: Zerto helps customers accelerate IT transformation by eliminating the risk and complexity of modernization and cloud adoption. By replacing multiple legacy solutions with a single IT Resilience Platform, Zerto is changing the way disaster recovery, data protection and cloud are managed. With enterprise scale, Zerto’s software platform delivers continuous availability for an always-on customer experience while simplifying workload mobility to protect, recover and move applications freely across hybrid and multi-clouds. Zerto is trusted by over 6,000 customers globally and is powering resiliency offerings for Microsoft Azure, IBM Cloud, AWS, Sungard Availability Services and more than 350 cloud services providers.
profile_positions.title: Enterprise Account Manager Benelux

profile_positions.description: AnylinQ was founded in 2006 with a clear strategy and focus on the niche of data management for medium and large enterprises. AnylinQ´s data management services enable companies to secure their data. It enables them to ensure their business continuity and compliance, at attractive and transparent cost. For more information about the company and its services, please refer to www.AnylinQ.com

We provide a full range of hybrid cloud data services that simplify management of applications and data across cloud and on-premises environments to accelerate digital transformation. Together with our partners, we empower global organizations to unleash the full potential of their data to expand customer touchpoints, foster greater innovation and optimize their operations.
